name: Boys Work
description:
Yume Nikki fan-game.

Boy's Work. Please handle this boy with care.
Four (4) dream worlds with over ten (10) effects to collect.

Made in RPG Maker MV the afternoon of the deadline
for Dream Diary Jam 2 (2018)--

- Version 0.00 (pls message me about bugs, broken stuff, and/or bad choices)
